00029 ScalarField::ScalarField( void ){
00030   std::cout << " in ScalarField()..." << std::endl;
00031   nx_ = 0;
00032   ny_ = 0;
00033   nz_ = 0;
00034   phi_ = new Array3(512,512,512);
00035   dx_ = 0.0f;
00036   nStencil_ = 0;
00037   nStencil2_ = 0;

00039 
00040 ScalarField::ScalarField( unsigned nx, unsigned ny, unsigned nz, 
00041               float dx, int nStencil ){
00042   std::cout << " in ScalarField(" << nx << "," << ny << "," << nz;
00043   std::cout << "," << dx << "," << nStencil << ")..."<< std::endl;
00044 
00045   nx_ = nx;
00046   ny_ = ny;
00047   nz_ = nz;
00048   phi_ = new Array3( nx, ny, nz );   //dy_( local_nx, ny, nz ),
00049   //phi_ = new float(nx*ny*nz);
00050   dx_ = dx;
00051   nStencil_ = nStencil;
00052   nStencil2_ = ( nStencil_ - 1 ) / 2;
00053 }

00059 ScalarField*
00060 ScalarField::operator=(ScalarField* s){
00061   nx_ = s->getNx();
00062   ny_ = s->getNy();
00063   nz_ = s->getNz();
00064   phi_ = s->getPhi();
00065   dx_ = s->getDx();
00066   nStencil_ = s->getNStencil();
00067   nStencil2_ = s->getNStencil2();
00068   return this;
00069 }

00091   nz_ = nz;

00094   nStencil2_ = ( nStencil - 1 ) / 2;

00138 void 
00139 ScalarField::lookup( float *Coord, unsigned nCoord, 
00140              std::vector< float >& values ) {
00141   values.clear();
00142   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < nCoord; ++i ) {
00143     values.push_back( this->getValue( Coord[3*i],Coord[3*i+1],Coord[3*i+2] ) );
00144   }
00145 }
00146 
00147 void
00148 ScalarField::lookup( float *Coord, unsigned nCoord, float ll, unsigned N, 
00149              std::vector< float >& values ) {
00150   values.clear();
00151   float factor = 1.0; //(float)N/ll;
00152   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < nCoord; ++i ) {
00153     values.push_back( this->getValue( factor*Coord[ 3*i ], 
00154                       factor*Coord[ 3*i+1 ], 
00155                       factor*Coord[ 3*i+2 ] ) );
00156   }
00157 }

00160 float 
00161 ScalarField::get_CIC( float coordx, float coordy, float coordz ) {
00162   
00163   int
00164     ix = ( int ) coordx,
00165     iy = ( int ) coordy,
00166     iz = ( int ) coordz,
00167     ix1 = ( ix + 1 ) % nx_,
00168     iy1 = ( iy + 1 ) % ny_,
00169     iz1 = ( iz + 1 ) % nz_;
00170   
00171   
00172   float
00173     dx = ( float ) ( coordx - ( float ) ix ),
00174     dy = ( float ) ( coordy - ( float ) iy ),
00175     dz = ( float ) ( coordz - ( float ) iz ),
00176     tx = 1.0 - dx,
00177     ty = 1.0 - dy,
00178     tz = 1.0 - dz;
00179 
00180   float
00181     f_xyz = ( *this ).getValue( ix, iy, iz ) * tx * ty * tz,
00182     f_Xyz = ( *this ).getValue( ix1, iy, iz ) * dx * ty * tz,
00183     f_xYz = ( *this ).getValue( ix, iy1, iz ) * tx * dy * tz,
00184     f_xyZ = ( *this ).getValue( ix, iy, iz1 ) * tx * ty * dz,
00185     f_XYz = ( *this ).getValue( ix1, iy1, iz ) * dx * dy * tz,
00186     f_XyZ = ( *this ).getValue( ix1, iy, iz1 ) * dx * ty * dz,
00187     f_xYZ = ( *this ).getValue( ix, iy1, iz1 ) * tx * dy * dz,
00188     f_XYZ = ( *this ).getValue( ix1, iy1, iz1 ) * dx * dy * dz;
00189   
00190   return f_xyz + f_Xyz + f_xYz + f_xyZ + f_XYz + f_XyZ + f_xYZ + f_XYZ;
00191 }
00192 
00193 float
00194 ScalarField::diff1( int ix, int iy, int iz, int i ) {
00195   int iright[ 3 ];
00196   for ( int k = 0; k < 3; ++k ){
00197     iright[ k ] = 0;
00198   }
00199   iright[ i ] = + 1;
00200   
00201   float d1i = 0.0;
00202   
00203   for ( int ii = -nStencil2_; ii <= nStencil2_; ++ii ) {
00204     int iix = ( ix + ii * iright[ 0 ] + nx_ ) % nx_;
00205     int iiy = ( iy + ii * iright[ 1 ] + ny_ ) % ny_;
00206     int iiz = ( iz + ii * iright[ 2 ] + nz_ ) % nz_;
00207     d1i += pStencil1_[ ii + nStencil2_ ] * this->getValue( iix, iiy, iiz );
00208     }
00209   
00210   return d1i;
00211 }

00213 
00214 float
00215 ScalarField::diff2( int ix, int iy, int iz, int i, int j ) {
00216   // trace component of the Hessian?
00217   if ( i == j ) {
00218     
00219     int iright[ 3 ];
00220     
00221     for ( int k = 0; k < 3; ++k )
00222       iright[ k ] = 0;
00223     iright[ i ] = + 1;
00224     
00225     float d2ii = 0.0;
00226     
00227     for ( int ii = -nStencil2_; ii <= nStencil2_; ++ii ) {
00228       int iix = ( ix + ii * iright[ 0 ] + nx_ ) % nx_;
00229       int iiy = ( iy + ii * iright[ 1 ] + ny_ ) % ny_;
00230       int iiz = ( iz + ii * iright[ 2 ] + nz_ ) % nz_;
00231       d2ii += pStencil2_[ ii + nStencil2_ ] * this->getValue( iix, iiy, iiz );
00232     }
00233     return d2ii;
00234   }
00235   
00236   // off-trace component of the Hessian
00237   int jright[ 3 ];
00238   
00239   for ( int k = 0; k < 3; ++k )
00240     jright[ k ] = 0;
00241   jright[ j ] = + 1;
00242   
00243   float d1j = 0;
00244   
00245   for ( int ii = -nStencil2_; ii <= nStencil2_; ++ii ) {
00246     int iix = ( ix + ii * jright[ 0 ] + nx_ ) % nx_;
00247     int iiy = ( iy + ii * jright[ 1 ] + ny_ ) % ny_;
00248     int iiz = ( iz + ii * jright[ 2 ] + nz_ ) % nz_;
00249     d1j += pStencil1_[ ii + nStencil2_ ] 
00250       * this->diff1( iix, iiy, iiz, i );
00251   }
00252   
00253   return d1j;
00254 }

00256 void
00257 ScalarField::test(){
00258   std::cout << " in ScalarField::test()..." << std::endl;
00259 
00260   for(unsigned ix=0; ix<nx_; ++ix){
00261     for(unsigned iy=0; iy<ny_; ++iy){
00262       for(unsigned iz=0; iz<nz_; ++iz){
00263     phi_.setValue( ix,iy,iz,-1.0f);
00264       }
00265     }
00266   }
00267 }
00268 
00275 void 
00276 ScalarField::put_CIC( unsigned npart, float *coord, float *wpar ) {
00277 
00278   unsigned ix, iy, iz, ix1, iy1, iz1;
00279   float x, y, z;
00280   float dx, dy, dz, dyw;
00281   float tx, ty, tz, tyw;
00282 
00283   static bool bInitialized( false );
00284 
00285   if ( !bInitialized ) {
00286     bInitialized = true;
00287     std::cout << " * * initializing density field with -1...";
00288     for ( ix = 0; ix < nx_; ++ix ){
00289       for ( iy = 0; iy < ny_; ++iy ){
00290     for ( iz = 0; iz < nz_; ++iz ){
00291       phi_.setValue( ix, iy, iz, -1.0f);
00292     }
00293       }
00294     }
00295     std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00296   }
00297 
00298   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < npart; ++i ) {
00299     x = coord[ 3*i+0 ];
00300     y = coord[ 3*i+1 ];
00301     z = coord[ 3*i+2 ];
00302 
00303     ix = unsigned ( x );
00304     iy = unsigned ( y );
00305     iz = unsigned ( z );
00306 
00307     dx = x - ( float ( ix ) );
00308     dy = y - ( float ( iy ) );
00309     dz = z - ( float ( iz ) );
00310 
00311     ix %= nx_;
00312     iy %= ny_;
00313     iz %= nz_;
00314 
00315     tx = 1.0 - dx;
00316     ty = 1.0 - dy;
00317     tz = 1.0 - dz;
00318 
00319     tyw = ty * wpar[ i ];
00320     dyw = dy * wpar[ i ];
00321 
00322     ix1 = ( ix + 1 ) % nx_;
00323     iy1 = ( iy + 1 ) % ny_;
00324     iz1 = ( iz + 1 ) % nz_;
00325 
00326     phi_.addValue( ix, iy, iz, tz * tx * tyw);
00327     phi_.addValue( ix, iy1, iz, tz * tx * dyw);
00328     phi_.addValue( ix, iy, iz1, dz * tx * tyw);
00329     phi_.addValue( ix, iy1, iz1, dz * tx * dyw);
00330 
00331     phi_.addValue( ix1, iy, iz, tz * dx * tyw);
00332     phi_.addValue( ix1, iy1, iz, tz * dx * dyw);
00333     phi_.addValue( ix1, iy, iz1, dz * dx * tyw);
00334     phi_.addValue( ix1, iy1, iz1, dz * dx * dyw);
00335 
00336   }
00337 }

00339 
00347 void
00348 ScalarField::diff2atCIC( float *Coord, unsigned nPoints,
00349              std::vector< Matrix33 > &t_ij ) {
00350 
00351   ChooseStencil();
00352 
00353   for ( unsigned ip = 0; ip < nPoints; ++ip ) {
00354     int ix = int ( Coord[ 3 * ip + 0 ] );
00355     int iy = int ( Coord[ 3 * ip + 1 ] );
00356     int iz = int ( Coord[ 3 * ip + 2 ] );
00357 
00358     if ( ix > int ( nx_ ) ) {
00359       std::cerr << " * * ERROR: index out of bounds! ";
00360       std::cerr << Coord[ 3 * ip ] << std::endl;
00361       ix = nx_;
00362     }
00363 
00364     int
00365       ix1 = ( ix + 1 ) % nx_,
00366       iy1 = ( iy + 1 ) % ny_,
00367       iz1 = ( iz + 1 ) % nz_;
00368 
00369     float x = ( ( float ) Coord[ 3*ip + 0 ] );
00370     float y = ( ( float ) Coord[ 3*ip + 1 ] );
00371     float z = ( ( float ) Coord[ 3*ip + 2 ] );
00372 
00373     float
00374       cic_dx = x - ( float ) ix;
00375     float cic_dy = y - ( float ) iy;
00376     float cic_dz = z - ( float ) iz;
00377     float cic_tx = 1.0 - cic_dx;
00378     float cic_ty = 1.0 - cic_dy;
00379     float cic_tz = 1.0 - cic_dz;
00380 
00381     float xyz = cic_tx * cic_ty * cic_tz;
00382     float Xyz = cic_dx * cic_ty * cic_tz;
00383     float xYz = cic_tx * cic_dy * cic_tz;
00384     float XYz = cic_dx * cic_dy * cic_tz;
00385     float xyZ = cic_tx * cic_ty * cic_dz;
00386     float XyZ = cic_dx * cic_ty * cic_dz;
00387     float xYZ = cic_tx * cic_dy * cic_dz;
00388     float XYZ = cic_dx * cic_dy * cic_dz;
00389 
00390     Matrix33 t;
00391 
00392     for ( int i = 0; i < 3; ++i ){
00393       for ( int j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00394 
00395     float
00396       f_ijk, f_Ijk, f_iJk, f_IJk,
00397       f_ijK, f_IjK, f_iJK, f_IJK;
00398 
00399     float
00400       dy_ijk, dy_Ijk, dy_iJk, dy_IJk,
00401       dy_ijK, dy_IjK, dy_iJK, dy_IJK;
00402 
00403     f_ijk = this->diff2( ix, iy, iz, i, j );
00404     f_Ijk = this->diff2( ix1, iy, iz, i, j );
00405     f_iJk = this->diff2( ix, iy1, iz, i, j );
00406     f_IJk = this->diff2( ix1, iy1, iz, i, j );
00407     f_ijK = this->diff2( ix, iy, iz1, i, j );
00408     f_IjK = this->diff2( ix1, iy, iz1, i, j );
00409     f_iJK = this->diff2( ix, iy1, iz1, i, j );
00410     f_IJK = this->diff2( ix1, iy1, iz1, i, j );
00411 
00412     dy_ijk = f_ijk * xyz;
00413     dy_Ijk = f_Ijk * Xyz;
00414     dy_iJk = f_iJk * xYz;
00415     dy_IJk = f_IJk * XYz;
00416     dy_ijK = f_ijK * xyZ;
00417     dy_IjK = f_IjK * XyZ;
00418     dy_iJK = f_iJK * xYZ;
00419     dy_IJK = f_IJK * XYZ;
00420 
00421     t( i, j ) = dy_ijk + dy_Ijk + dy_iJk + dy_IJk + dy_ijK + dy_IjK + dy_iJK + dy_IJK;
00422       }
00423     }
00424     t_ij.push_back( t );
00425   }
00426 }

00429 
00435 void
00436 ScalarField::ChooseStencil( void ) {
00437   switch ( nStencil_ ) {
00438 
00439   case 3:
00440     pStencil1_ = stencil3_1;
00441     pStencil2_ = stencil3_2;
00442     break;
00443 
00444   case 5:
00445     pStencil1_ = stencil5_1;
00446     pStencil2_ = stencil5_2;
00447     break;
00448 
00449   case 7:
00450     pStencil1_ = stencil7_1;
00451     pStencil2_ = stencil7_2;
00452     break;
00453 
00454   case 9:
00455     pStencil1_ = stencil9_1;
00456     pStencil2_ = stencil9_2;
00457     break;
00458 
00459   case 11:
00460     pStencil1_ = stencil11_1;
00461     pStencil2_ = stencil11_2;
00462     break;
00463 
00464   default:
00465     std::cerr << " * * ERROR: unsupported finite difference scheme ";
00466     std::cerr << "in ScalarField::ChooseStencil!" << std::endl;
00467     abort();
00468   }
00469 }
